page.title: 17HUNTING
page.content: The shooting in{STRETTON}is pheasant pigeon,partridge.We shoot pigeons between October to January because there is no date that you should shoot them in.We used to rear our own pheasants and partridge but now we buy them from a Game Farm.We put our pheasants into a release pen for about 6 weeks in June and July. Then when they are about 11 weeks old we let them out of the pens and put them into the woods. The shooting in{Chilcote}is only partridge and duck. We feed the ducks on two ponds and we shoot them from September the 1st .There are some snipe,mallard,teal and coots on the pond.Once there were some swans as well. About once a year the Atherstone hunt meet at the Old Rectory in Appleby.
